repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
MAINTAINER Sava 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y software-properties-common wget unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8 
RUN locale-gen $LANG 
RUN add-apt-repository ppa:openjdk-r/ppa 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y openjdk-8-jre && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENV JAVA_HOME /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/ 
RUN export JAVA_HOME
